SENT.plain: SUMMARY: The Sturge-Weber Syndrome (SWS) is a neurocutaneous disorder characterized by leptomeningeal and facial angiomas, neurologic and ocular manifestations
We report a case of oophorectomy for ovarian dermoid in a 14 year-old girl who was a diagnosed case of Sturge-Weber Syndrome
General anaesthesia was given for the procedure
The perioperative anaesthestic management is discussed in the present report
